title: PSA: For clean party chat with no background sounds do the ... - Reddit
body: Go: Settings > Display & sound > Volume > Chat mixer > Mute all other sounds. And tell your friends about it. You (and your friends) will enjoy party chat without TV sounds, children making noise, dogs barking, etc, coming through the headset. It gets so silent that when me and my friends first tried it, one of them kept asking if we were still ...
